description: The Solid Terms vocabulary defines terms referenced in Solid specifications.
label: Solid Terms

InsertDeletePatch.description: A class of patch expressing insertions, deletions, and conditional modifications to a resource that has an RDF-based representation.
InsertDeletePatch.label: Insert/delete patch

Patch.description: A patch expresses conditional modifications to a resource that has an RDF-based representation.
Patch.label: Patch

ListedDocument.description: Listed Type Index is a registry of resources that are publicly discoverable by outside users and applications.
ListedDocument.label: Listed Type Index

Timeline.description: A resource containing time ordered items and sub-containers.  Sub-containers may be desirable in file based systems to split the timeline into logical components e.g. /yyyy-mm-dd/ as used in ISO 8061.
Timeline.label: Timeline

TypeIndex.description: A index of type registries for resources. Applications can register the RDF type they use and list them in the index resource.
TypeIndex.label: Type index

TypeRegistration.description: The registered types that map a RDF classes/types to their locations using either `instance` or `instanceContainer` property.
TypeRegistration.label: Type Registration

UnlistedDocument.description: Unlisted Type Index is a registry of resources that are private to the user and their apps, for types that are not publicly discoverable.
UnlistedDocument.label: Unlisted Type Index

account.description: A solid account belonging to an Agent.
account.label: account

deletes.description: The triple patterns this patch removes from the document.
deletes.label: deletes

forClass.description: A class that is used to map an listed or unlisted type index.
forClass.label: registry class

inbox.description: Deprecated pointer to a Linked Data Notifications inbox; please use http://www.w3.org/ns/ldp#inbox instead.
inbox.label: inbox (deprecated)

inserts.description: The triple patterns this patch adds to the document.
inserts.label: inserts

instance.description: Maps a type to an individual resource, typically an index or a directory listing resource.
instance.label: instance

instanceContainer.description: Maps a type to a container which the client would have to list to get the instances of that type.
instanceContainer.label: instance container

loginEndpoint.description: The login URI of a given server.
loginEndpoint.label: loginEndpoint

logoutEndpoint.description: The logout URI of a given server.
logoutEndpoint.label: logoutEndpoint

oidcIssuer.description: The preferred OpenID Connect issuer URI for a given WebID.
oidcIssuer.label: OIDC issuer

owner.description: A person or social entity that is considered to have control, rights, and responsibilities over a data storage.
owner.label: owner

patches.description: The document to which this patch applies.
patches.label: patches

privateTypeIndex.description: Points to an unlisted type index resource.
privateTypeIndex.label: private type index

publicTypeIndex.description: Points to a listed type index resource.
publicTypeIndex.label: public type index

read.description: Indicates if a message has been read or not. This property should have a boolean datatype.
read.label: read

storageQuota.description: The quota of non-volatile memory that is available for the account (in bytes)
storageQuota.label: Non-volatile memory quota

storageUsage.description: The amount of non-volatile memory that the account have used (in bytes)
storageUsage.label: Non-volatile memory usage

where.description: The conditions the document and the inserted and deleted triple patterns need to satisfy in order for the patch to be applied.
where.label: where
